Articles.Content: My own Gustlik tug uses the Poodle. It's quite strong, and lets this mid-weight craft handle much bigger payloads with ease. Unfortunately, it's also a fuel-guzzler. It uses Rockomax X200 - 16 tank, and sometimes i have to tap into payloads fuel reserves to make it to my station. Which engines would you recommend?
I use 2 NERVA's on my tug. it's not fast, but it's a tug, often I don't want fast.

I use this:

Or this:
...I have a hard time believing that that actually works.

...I have a hard time believing that that actually works.

Very well, actually.

I use the second one more often because it's stackable.
2 NERVA's work for me as well. I only use tugs for mun transfers and for orbit changes though.
